name: Sniper Bot Gun Shooting
description:
Sniper Bot Shooting is a challenging First Person Shooter (FPS) game where you have to get back your your Craft from an onslaught of futuristic little robots.

The year is 2050, and robots have invaded the world. Some nasty little machines have hijacked your Craft and are marching up your pathway – intent on destruction.

Your goal is to stop them in their tracks by Shooting them where ever they appear the have the ability to position themselves in different locations.Your quick reactions also come into play, as you have to use your weapons to quickly and smartly stop the seemingly endless wave of these Nasty machines.You play the role of JAX – a representative of good side of the new robot Earth.TINA will be helping you on your way with intelligent suggestions.
Be Bold Bravo
